so_23045089: xrandr -q

LVDS1 connected 1366x768+0+0 (normal left inverted right x axis y axis) 293mm x 164mm
1366x768       60.0*+
1360x768       59.8     60.0

xrandr -s 2

Explanations about Options.--output: Selects an output to reconfigure. Use either the name of the output or the XID.
Explanations about Options.-s:
This sets the screen size, either matching by size or using the index into the list
 of available sizes.
Explanations about Options.--mode: This selects a mode. Use either the name or the XID for mode
